body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to Happy Motors customer service. My name is Philip Campbell and I will be assisting you today. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Brittany. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I purchased a car from your dealership and I'm feeling excited about it, but I have some questions about your return policy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Sure, I'd be happy to help. Could you please provide me with the VIN number of the vehicle you purchased?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The VIN number is five six seven eight zero zero one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Brittany. One more piece of information I need is the date of purchase of the vehicle.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I bought the car on two zero zero four, December twenty seventh.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing the necessary details, Brittany. I will look into the return policy for you. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That's all for now, thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Brittany. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to reach out. Thank you for contacting Happy Motors customer service. Have a great day!
